ream.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a standard amount of paper, 500 pieces in the US or 480 pieces in Britain
ream.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to treat someone badly, especially by cheating
ream.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a large amount of writing or information, usually on paper
ream.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: They have to wade through reams of data.
ream.translation[2].definitions[1].defin: a pack containing 500 pieces of paper
